citeinfo.title: Custom Link Sample

pubinfo.pubplace: 380 New York St., Redlands, CA, USA

citeinfo.othercit: Other information required to complete the citation.

descript.abstract: This is a test metadata record for use in the Add a custom link to a search result web help topic. Note, the ftp URL here is just a sample and does not open an actual ftp site.
descript.supplinf: This does not represent an actual dataset

browse.browsen: Name of a related graphic file that provides an illustration of the data set.
browse.browsed: A text description of the illustration.

idinfo.datacred: Recognition of those who contributed to the data set.
idinfo.native: Software and version (operating system and version), platform

enttyp.enttypl: The name of the entity type.
enttyp.enttypd: The description of the entity type.
enttyp.enttypds: Entity Type Definition Source -- the authority of the definition.

attr.attrdefs: Attribute Definition Source -- the authority of the definition.

rdom.attrunit: The standard of measurement for an attribute value.

attrvai.attrvae: The definition of the Attribute Value Accuracy measure and units, and a description of how the estimate was derived.

overview.eaover: Detailed summary of the information contained in a data set.
overview.eadetcit: Reference to the complete description of the entity types, attributes, and attribute values for the data set.

spdoinfo.indspref: Name of types of geographic features, addressing schemes, or other means through which locations are referenced in the data set.

digtinfo.formcont: Description of the content of the data encoded in a format.

onlinopt.oncomp: Standard Internet browser, PC, Mac, UNIX, Linux systems

attracc.attraccr: An explanation of the accuracy of the identification of the entities and assignments of values in the data set and a description of the tests used.

dataqual.logic: An explanation of the fidelity of the relationships in the data set and the tests used.
dataqual.complete: Information about omissions, selection criteria, generalization, definitions used, and other rules used to derive the data set.

horizpa.horizpar: An explanation of the accuracy of the horizontal coordinate measurements and a description of the tests used.

vertacc.vertaccr: An explanation of the accuracy of the vertical coordinate measurements and a description of the tests used.

srctime.srccurr: The basis on which the source time period of content information of the source data set is determined.

srcinfo.srccitea: Short-form alias for the source citation.
srcinfo.srccontr: Brief statement identifying the information contributed by the source to the data set.

procstep.procdesc: An explanation of the event and related parameters or tolerances.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
